dt: {bc}a control over the expression of one's emotions or thoughts

shortdef: an act of restraining : the state of being restrained
a means of restraining : a restraining force or influence

dt: {bc}a resilient pad at the top of the back of an automobile seat especially for preventing whiplash

shortdef: a resilient pad at the top of the back of an automobile seat especially for preventing whiplash

dt: {bc}a restraint (such as a self-locking seat belt) that acts automatically to protect an automobile rider during a crash

shortdef: a restraint (such as a self-locking seat belt) that acts automatically to protect an automobile rider during a crash

dt: {bc}governmental prohibition imposed on expression before the expression actually takes place
